root.name: Toxic Crusaders
root.description: In the game you play six different levels fighting off different enemies with your mop. You start in Tromaville, fighting the Radiation Rangers, traveling through different locations such as on top of a train or inside an alien spaceship. Eventually you end up in Czar Zoster's palace, who is the main villain of the game.

similar_games.game: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV: Turtles in Time
